00028 #define ZO_TYPES_H

00032 //common defines__________________________________________________________________________
00033 
00034 #ifndef FALSE
00035 
00036 #define FALSE   0
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #ifndef TRUE
00040 
00041 #define TRUE    (-1)
00042 #endif
00043

00045

00047 #endif

00057 #endif

00064 //common datatype definitions_____________________________________________________________
00065 typedef int8_t      bool;   
00066 typedef uint8_t u08;    
00067 typedef int8_t      s08;    
00068 typedef uint16_t    u16;    
00069 typedef int16_t s16;    
00070 typedef uint32_t    u32;    
00071 typedef int32_t     s32;    
00072 typedef uint64_t    u64;    
00073 typedef int64_t     s64;    
00074 
00075 //minimums/maximums_______________________________________________________________________
00076 //maximum value that can be held by unsigned data types (8,16,32bits)
00077 #define MAX_U08 255         ///< maximum value for unsigned 8-bit integer
00078 #define MAX_U16 65535       ///< maximum value for unsigned 16-bit integer
00079 #define MAX_U32 4294967295  ///< maximum value for unsigned 32-bit integer
00080 
00081 //maximum values that can be held by signed data types (8,16,32bits)
00082 #define MIN_S08 -128        ///< minimum value for unsigned 8-bit integer
00083 #define MAX_S08 127         ///< maximum value for unsigned 8-bit integer
00084 #define MIN_S16 -32768      ///< minimum value for unsigned 8-bit integer
00085 #define MAX_S16 32767       ///< maximum value for unsigned 8-bit integer
00086 #define MIN_S32 -2147483648 ///< minimum value for unsigned 8-bit integer
00087 #define MAX_S32 2147483647  ///< maximum value for unsigned 8-bit integer
00088 
00089 //Usefull unions of types with byte arrays________________________________________________
00091 typedef union {
00092     u08 byte[2];            
00093     u16 all;                
00094 }U16;
00095 
00097 typedef union {
00098     u08 byte[2];            
00099     s16 all;                
00100 }S16;
00101 
00103 typedef union {
00104     u08 byte[4];            
00105     u32 all;                
00106 }U32;
00107 
00109 typedef union {
00110     u08 byte[4];            
00111     s32 all;                
00112 }S32;
00113 
00115 typedef union {
00116     u08 byte[8];            
00117     u64 all;                
00118 }U64;
00119 
00121 typedef union {
00122     u08 byte[8];            
00123     s64 all;                
00124 }S64;
